title: menchie's font
content:
I know I’ve seen it before, and i’m kicking myself for not writing down the name. Does anyone know what the Menchie’s font is?  
 [here’s an example of the type they use](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928173518/http:/www.michelleleclercdesign.com/freelance_supplies/menchies.jpg)

 [‹ american gothic or british grotesque or …?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928173518/http:/typophile.com/node/49891 "Go to previous forum topic") [Handwriting font in former issues of POPmagazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080928173518/http:/typophile.com/node/49845 "Go to next forum topic")
author: michelleleclerc
